column4: Hi I am using ubuntu 9.10 but I am not able to stop or start videos of youtube in my firefox browser using my mouse click. I have adobe flash plugin installed what must be the problem?
NthDegree: Then what should I use?
go get 64bit flash alpha prerelease without hole or Chromium with html5 support
NthDegree: Can you please provide me the url for both?
done, but where is the icon?
well simple start as user in console Chromium
when I am typing chromium-bsu it is launching the game
